}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[AzureWave AW-HM482]] (AH) • 802.11ah Wireless LAN Module :FCC ID: TLZ-HM482 (2021-09-28) • 802.11ah 1T1R • SD (LGA)
*[[Newracom]] [https://newracom.com/products/nrc7292?hsLang=en NRC7292] - SDIO 3.0 (WLAN) :802.11ah 1T1R (1x1:1), HaLow + MCU SoC
*Supports 903 ~ 927MHz frequency band *Supports single-stream 150kbps ~ 15Mbps data rate
{{See also|AzureWave|Newracom}}
==See also== *[[AzureWave AW-XB468NF]] (AX1800) • [[ASUS PCE-AX1800]] :[[MediaTek]] MT7921LEN (2T2R) 802.11ax *[[AzureWave AW-XB473NF]] (AX1800) • [https://24wireless.info/wifi-6-module-for-pc PR] :[[Realtek]] RTL8852AE (2T2R) 802.11ax *[[AzureWave AW-XB503NF]] (AX1800) • [https://24wireless.info/wifi-6-module-for-pc PR] :[[Realtek]] RTL8852AE-VT (1T2R) 802.11ax <!-- (RTL8852AE-VT has 1T2R only) -->
*[[AzureWave AW-HM482]] (AH) • 802.11ah Wireless LAN Module :FCC ID: TLZ-HM482 (2021-09-28) • [[Newracom]] NRC7292
